name: Wanfeng Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Jinhui Wanfeng Coal Mine Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E9%87%91%E6%99%96%E4%B8%87%E5%B3%B0%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Wanfeng Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Wangma Village, Xiazha Township, Xiaoyi City, Luliang City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Jinhui Wanfeng Coal Mine Company
web_search_companies.notes: Shanxi Jinhui Wanfeng Coal Mine Company operates the mine and is fully owned by Jizhong Energy Group.
